title: Domain 4.5: Summarize environmental impacts and local environmental controls.
content:
📋 Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) / Handling & Disposal

  • Proper battery disposal: 🔋 Batteries can leak chemicals—dispose at approved recycling centers.
  • Proper toner disposal: 🖨️ Return toner/ink cartridges to manufacturers or take to e-waste facilities.
  • Proper disposal of devices/assets: 🧯 Follow local regulations for electronics recycling—never use regular trash.

🌡️ Temperature, Humidity, and Ventilation

  • Location/equipment placement: 🧊 Avoid heat sources and ensure airflow to prevent overheating.
  • Dust cleanup: 🧹 Dust reduces cooling efficiency—clean regularly with safe tools.
  • Compressed air/vacuums: 💨 Use ESD-safe methods to clean inside PCs without damaging components.

⚡ Power Surges, Undervoltage, and Power Failures

  • Battery backup (UPS): 🔋 Provides emergency power—gives time to save work and shut down properly.
  • Surge suppressor: ⚡ Shields equipment from sudden power spikes—essential for protecting electronics.
